declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:paymentInfoId[1]}</urn1:paymentInfoId><urn1:paymentInfoId>${create2#Response#declare namespace urn2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; con:config.con:query: select unique(A.MESSAGEID),A.MARKETTYPE,A.MESSAGEIDENTIFICATION,C.ENDTOENDID,C.DEBITCOUNTERVALUEAMT, A.NUMBEROFTRANSACTIONS,C.TRANSACTIONSID,C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID,C.PAYMENTTYPE,C.PAYMENTSTATUS,C.MARKETPRODUCTNAME,C.ISPC, C.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID,C.DEBETACCOUNTNO from MESSAGE A,PAYMENTINFO B, TRANSACTIONS C where A.MESSAGEID = B.FK_MESSAGEID and B.PAYMENTINFOID = C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and C.TRANSACTIONSID in ('${create1#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}','${create2#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}','${create3#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}','${create4#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}','${PaymentCreate_5#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}')

declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:paymentInfoId[1]}</urn1:paymentInfoId> <urn1:paymentInfoId>${create2#Response#declare namespace urn2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace urn='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //urn:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/urn:paymentResult[1]/urn2:paymentInfoId[1]}</urn1:paymentInfoId> <urn1:paymentInfoId>${create3#Response#declare namespace urn2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; con:config.con:query: select * from ASYNC_STUPBATCH_PAYMENTINFOS where PAYMENTINFOID in ('${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[4]/FK_PAYMENTINFOID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/FK_PAYMENTINFOID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/FK_PAYMENTINFOID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[3]/FK_PAYMENTINFOID[1]}')

select * from APPROVER where FK_TRANSACTIONSID in ('${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[3]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[4]/TRANSACTIONSID[1]}')

select unique(A.MESSAGEID),C.TRANSACTIONSID,C.PAYMENTSTATUS from MESSAGE A,PAYMENTINFO B, TRANSACTIONS C, ADVICETRANSACTION D where A.MESSAGEID = B.FK_MESSAGEID and B.PAYMENTINFOID = C.FK_PAYMENTINFOID and A.MESSAGEID IN ('${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/MESSAGEID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[2]/MESSAGEID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[3]/MESSAGEID[1]}','${JDBC Request#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[4]/MESSAGEID[1]}')
